content: learn how to make a beautiful modern granny square bag with this pattern this crochet bag pattern is the perfect accessory to tote around all season details - pattern is written in standard us terms - basic knowledge of beginner stitches is needed to make this pattern - pattern includes step-by-step photos and a guided video tutorial - level adventurous beginners who love learning new skills - size of bag 12 1/2 wide x 10″ long materials needed - 3 skeins of hobby lobby yarn bee cotton et lin in the color parchment weight 4/ 3 5oz 180 yds a total of 540 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 1 skein of hobby lobby yarn bee pima suprema in the color charcoal weight 4/3 5 oz 180 yds a total of 180 yards or you can use another worsted weight yarn - 5 0 mm h crochet hook - stitch marker optional - darning needle - scissors
